About Us

Affinity Marketing & Web Solutions is a client based website development company that works to bring immediate results to their customers. The business, created by Joe Benson and Andrew Exton in San Luis Obispo, California has enhanced the public image of numerous local small businesses, and non-profit organizations. At its core, Affinity utilizes the most advanced Search Engine Optimization techniques to drive clients websites to the top of search results. How does Affinity set itself apart from competition? Incorporating content driven and minimalistic appearances, Affinity impresses their client’s potential customers with clean aesthetics and ease of use. Affinity Marketing & Web Solutions strives to foster the success of businesses in all spectrums by providing rapid results personally committing to their clients with complete quality assurance.
